program.name: python -m ep_bolfi.kadi_tools.store_measurement_as_parquet
program.description: Please refer to the --help output of this file.

param.description: Persistent record identifier to upload the file to.
param.name: record

param.description: File name of the Parquet file to upload.
param.name: filename

param.description: Type of the measurement, which determines the internal format for further processing. 'cycling' refers to Cycling_Information, 'static' to Static_Information' and 'impedance' to Impedance_Information. If you are unsure which to pick, consult the package documentation.
param.name: datatype

param.description: Compression level setting for the compression algorithm Zstandard. -7 is fastest and largest, while 22 ist slowest and smallest. Note that decompression has the same (fast) speed at any level.
param.name: compression-level

param.description: Whether or not an already existing file by the same name in the record gets overwritten.
param.name: overwrite
